website_summaries.verdict: If you need an inexpensive laptop that can easily handle multiple apps at once and is built to last, this model is worth a look.

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good laptop a little slow but love all the features updates are perfect everything it said 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Travis D

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot slower than I imagined. My much older laptop is much faster. And it didn’t come with a power chord. Which I wasn’t expecting at all. I don’t buy laptops all that often- is that the norm? So far these are my two big disappointments. But I appreciate that it came with Windows 10 installed. And we’ll see how it does over time.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use for home personal use. It is good, but wish it was a little faster especially on power up. Can live with it as I go get a cup of juice.
customer_reviews.author: maxine

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little susceptible with some of the review regarding the laptop with the speed of it. I'm not sure what these people are wanting but I think many of them have forgotten how slow computers were in the beginning. I'm ok with the little wait time for boot up. Other than, so far the it has exceeded my expectations and the bad reviews I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Very slow
customer_reviews.text: It's incredibly slow. I've been really happy with Dell Laptops at work for over 20 years. They have lost the recipe. Am going back to using my 12-year old Dell with the broken screen and the bust-up control button panel. It works great compared to this 2020 junk.
customer_reviews.author: BertieJ

customer_reviews.title: Works for mw
customer_reviews.text: I use this laptop for youtube. It hasn't failed me at all. I can watch multiple vids with no problem. I haven't used it to edit my vids yet but i feel like this work be great for me . Anyways I give it 2 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop! It works very well and for the price you really can't beat it! Super fast, bright screen, soft keyboard, and awesome webcam! Would gladly order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! Screen Resolution is not ideal
customer_reviews.text: Decided to downgrade to save money as I only really use the computer to pay bills and no longer watch movies, or do gaming etc. Went from 17" with 1920x1080 resolution to this 15.7" screen and 1366x768 resolution. Displaying two pages side-by-side requires too much use of the lower scroll bar to access all of the view. It is very uncomfortable and will take some getting used to. Don't get stuck like me. Do a little research to find the best recommendation for your desired screen size.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: This is the slowest laptop I used. I did read the reviews but I thought how bad can it be. Well it is bad. I had thought my work laptop was slow, this is worse. I bought it because it was more that 1/2 the price of the one I really wanted and for what I am going to use it for it should have been ok. Wish I had bought the one I really wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Brand new computer - can't adjust brightness, crashed 4 times and made whirring sound - now this is only being used for online lessons, so not like it's heavily used and abused. Then UPS receipt showed it was received 2 weeks ago, still no refund. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: CJJN

customer_reviews.title: Dell laptop Sucks!!
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work well. It Keeps going down. It has a slow start up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very slow
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer to replace my 10 year old laptop and this computer ran slower than the old computer. I could barely get through the set up process. I had to return and I bought a different product. Seriously, spend an extra $100 dollars on something better. This was not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ragdoll28

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this laptop has so far lived up to expectations. Only have had it a week,but I am very satisfied with it. Great deal for the price! ($373) Brand new Dell 2020 model. Get one while they last.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!! Slower than slow
customer_reviews.text: All I needed this for was internet and streaming. So slow entering you password to login takes 20 seconds. In processes of stripping everything off to try and increase speed. Removed Preload Macafee security and that helped dramatically, now I might consider this as a potential tool. I now would give this a 1 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality & Other
customer_reviews.text: I bought what I thought was a new computer. The computer didn't hold a charge. Also when I initially booted it up, it said that it had a memory change. Not good. I had to go thru Amazon customer service for this company to issue me a credit back to my card. Only after Amazon contacted them on my behalf did they issue a credit.
customer_reviews.author: KSB

customer_reviews.title: It's nice....but a little slow.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop a little bit ago. It's nice, it is a little slow to load things. But I don't mind that. It took me a while to get the terabyte storage to work. I just got my old English teacher to help me access the TB. So now I have more storage. Besides the run around with the TB and the slow loading, it's a good laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Deadly Asylum

customer_reviews.title: Great product delivered precisely as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get an urgent replacement to my daughter in the US (I live in Europe). I have had great luck with both Amazon and Dell in the past, and this was no exception. Product was delivered exactly on time, and my daughter loves it. Thanks again Amazon for saving my day. The transaction was flawless despite being ordered from Europe (I have had many problems with other US vendors).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Warning - do not buy Dell! This was our first, we have always gotten HP. Bought this for my son, 1st year in college. The hard drive had to be replaced within one month, absolutely no help from seller! That was about 2 weeks ago, problems today with accessing his Microsoft programs. I will be replacing with an HP, my son needs a computer for classes, Dell is completely unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes getting use to the harder keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Takes getting use to the harder keyboard. Works best with a mouse
customer_reviews.author: C J Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Built-in camera isn’t great
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of the processor, but have been pleasantly surprised by the overall performance of this laptop. My only negative is the video camera quality. It might be worth some extra to get a better camera especially with distance learning.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Is there better computers out there, of course. But for this price rage you can't beat it! I was always a dell fan and this computer has not let me down!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lally Jr

customer_reviews.title: Terrible operating system
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculous trying to load windows screens keep locking up spent the whole day trying to get the thing to run
customer_reviews.author: paul castro

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop for the price. Has really helped with my teaching.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my wife. She loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Noemi Romero

customer_reviews.title: Sorriest laptop Dell ever made
customer_reviews.text: Only paperwork that came with it was telling you how to disassemble it. Which that is good to know if it ever needs a new battery. Cant access battery without taking it apart. Can connect headphones but sound comes through headphones and computer so why use headphones. Kind of slow. Waste of hard earned money
customer_reviews.author: L. Sides

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, nothing but a hassle
customer_reviews.text: I spent over 2 hours messing with this laptop. At first it came up with a screen that said to run some test, thought that was odd, but did. Finally, it let me in, started personalizing it, then froze up. Then it restarted and wouldn’t go past the Dell logo screen. It’d try, shut off, try, etc. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely garbage. Slow right of the box. Slower than my 4yr old Dell laptop. Had it for a while now and done everything I can think of. Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Dual Boot
customer_reviews.text: I really like the GUID Partition Table on the hard drive because it makes installing UBUNTU with dual boot to Windows a LOT easier because the FAT32 drives can only have 4 logical partitions and GUID can have 128!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laptop
customer_reviews.text: Product came in perfect condition and works perfectly. I make music so if you looking for a laptop with a lot of storage and something that is perfect for gaming and music. This would be a great product to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: that it is a great computer.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new computer ,my old one was old. This one new 2020 it is different , so I will have to learn a lot.
customer_reviews.author: ANGA SINGLETON

customer_reviews.title: Dell Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the delivery time and that the product was not damaged. This laptop is very fast and comfortable to use. It does everything I expected and more.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M Wittey

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: I loved it , just my 86 year old brain couldn’t figure how to go back to a Dell from an IPad...just couldn’t wrap my head around it...
customer_reviews.author: ANN GRENCI

customer_reviews.title: Slow Computer
customer_reviews.text: The computer I purchased is the slowest computer I have ever had. I am completely dissatisfied and need to get it fixed or return it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new computer! After shopping all around found this one. What I needed and I am glad I got it
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Morse

customer_reviews.title: RAM speed not what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: The item purchased was with 8 gb ram. The laptops system reflects only 4 gb ram. Disappointed since that was not what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Defective merch, fake packing slip
customer_reviews.text: Defective laptop, did not even turn on. Shipment was created with a fake packing slip - suggests some kind of bunk seller
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the slowest computer I’ve ever seen. We don’t even have much on it. This was a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good Laptop
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and in perfect condition. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it had a number pad. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Sapelli

customer_reviews.title: sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst laptop I have ever used DO NOT BUY THIS IT SUCKS
customer_reviews.author: timothy

product_meta.title: 2020 Newest Dell Inspiron 15 3000 PC Laptop: 15.6" HD Anti-Glare LED-Backlit Nontouch Display, Intel 2-Core 4205U Processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD, WiFi, Bluetooth, HDMI, Webcam,DVD-RW, Win 10
product_meta.description:
Capacity:8GB Memroy, 256GB SSD + 1TB HD

Tech specs

Display: 15.6-inch HD (1366 x 768) Anti-Glare LED-Backlit Non-touch Display

Processor: Intel Dual-Core 4205U (1.80GHz Base, 2M Cache)

Memory: 8GB DDR4 Ram

Hard drive Size: 256GB SSD + 1TB HDD Dual Drive

Optical drive: DVD-RW

Operating system: Windows 10 Home

Audio: Waves MaxxAudio Pro boosts volume and clarifies every tone

Video Card: Intel UHD Graphics 610 with shared memory

Ports: 2 x USB 3.1 Gen1, 1 x USB 2.0, 1 x SD Card Reader, 1 x HDMI, 1 x RJ45, 1 x Headphone & Microphone Audio Jack

Wireless: 802.11AC+ Bluetooth

Primary Battery: 3-Cell 42WHr Battery(Integrated)

Dimensions & Weight: Height: 0.89" (22.7mm)| Width: 14.96" (380.0mm) | Depth: 10.16" (258.0mm) | Starting weight 4.8lbs (2.17kg)
feature_bullets: 256GB SSD + 1 TB 5400 RPM 2.5-inch SATA Hard Drive

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars147 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
